title: Software Engineer
description:
**What You Will Need for this Position:** 




 You need to have a strong passion for software development and must take pride in designing and coding. You should also have great analytical skills and ability to handle complex, modular software development in a collaborative team\\-based environment.
 



 In addition to this, you will have a leg up if you also meet the following criteria:
 



  





**Educational Qualifications / Background:** 



* Bachelor‚Äôs degree (or higher) in Computer Science OR related technical discipline
* Strong understanding of Computer Science fundamentals
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills along with strong interpersonal skills



  





**Primary Skills:** 



* 2 to 4 years of Software Development experience in developing and shipping software
* Excellent troubleshooting skills
* Proven ability to work in a fast paced, agile environment and result oriented culture
* Hands\\-on programming experience with Java including Object Oriented Design
* Experience with RESTful Web Services and API development using Spring/Dropwizard or any other framework
* Experience with one or more of the databases: SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, Couchbase, Cassandra, AWS DynamoDB or other NoSQL technologies
* Experience of working with Queuing technologies such as RabbitMQ/Kafka/Active MQ



  





**Preferred Skills:** 



* Experience in full stack development ranging from front\\-end user interfaces to backend systems
* Experience/knowledge into JavaScript \\+ Angular/React Js/Typescript, Graph Query Language (GQL)
* Experience of working with Elasticsearch/Solr
* Experience with Cloud Computing platforms like AWS/GCP/Azure Cloud

description:

 **Core Java** 
 , OOP concepts, collections, exception handling, and basic multithreading.

* Familiarity with Agile methodologies.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About Client:** 




 Our Client is a global IT services company headquartered in Southborough, Massachusetts, USA. Founded in 1996, with a revenue of $1\\.8B, with 35,000\\+ associates worldwide, specializes in digital engineering, and IT services company helping clients modernize their technology infrastructure, adopt cloud and AI solutions, and accelerate innovation. It partners with major firms in banking, healthcare, telecom, and media.
 







 Our Client is known for combining deep industry expertise with agile development practices, enabling scalable and cost\\-effective digital transformation. The company operates in over 50 locations across more than 25 countries, has delivery centers in Asia, Europe, and North America and is backed by Baring Private Equity Asia.
 











**Job Title: ServiceNow Developer** 




**Key Skills: ITSM, Service Catalog, Flow Designer, Integration Hub, Rest API, Java Script** 




**Job Locations:** 
 Bangalore
 



**Experience: 9** 
 Years
 



**Budget:** 
 18 LPA
 



**Education Qualification: Any Graduation** 




**Job Description:** 




  





 We are seeking a skilled
 **ServiceNow Developer** 
 with strong experience in ITSM, Service Catalog, Flow Designer, Integration Hub, and REST API integrations. The ideal candidate will design, develop, and implement ServiceNow solutions to automate IT service processes and improve operational efficiency.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design, develop, and customize ServiceNow applications using
 **ITSM modules** 
 (Incident, Problem, Change, Request).
* Develop and maintain

 , workflows, and request fulfillment processes.
* Build automation using
 **Flow Designer** 
 and
 **Integration Hub** 
 .
* Implement and manage
 **REST API integrations** 
 with third\\-party systems.
* Develop client\\-side and server\\-side scripts using
 **JavaScript** 
 .
* Configure business rules, UI policies, client scripts, and script includes.
* Perform system upgrades, patching, and application deployments.
* Provide L2/L3 production support and troubleshoot issues.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and deliver solutions.
* Follow ITIL best practices and ServiceNow development standards.



**Required Skills** 



* Strong experience in
 **ServiceNow ITSM**
* Hands\\-on experience with
 **Service Catalog \\& Request Management**

 **Flow Designer and Integration Hub**
* Experience with
 **REST API integrations**
* Strong knowledge of
 **JavaScript (Client \\& Server scripting)**

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
**About the Role** 




 We are looking for a detail\\-oriented
 **QA Engineer** 
 to ensure the quality, reliability, and performance of our software products. You will work closely with developers, product owners, and project teams to test applications, identify bugs, and improve overall product quality. This role requires strong analytical skills and a passion for delivering flawless user experiences.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents.
* Develop detailed, comprehensive, and well\\-structured test plans and test cases.
* Execute manual test cases for web, mobile, and API testing.
* Identify, document, and track software defects using tools like JIRA.
* Collaborate with developers to troubleshoot issues and verify fixes.
* Perform regression, functional, integration, and system testing.
* Work with automation tools (Selenium, Postman, JMeter, etc.)‚Äîbonus if experienced.
* Ensure software quality at every stage of development.
* Contribute to continuous improvement of QA processes and standards.



  





**Required Skills** 



* Strong understanding of software testing methodologies and SDLC/STLC.
* Experience in manual testing of web or mobile applications.
* Good knowledge of test case design techniques.
* Proficiency with test management and bug tracking tools (JIRA, TestRail).
* Basic experience with API testing tools like Postman or Swagger.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Good communication and documentation skills.



  





**Preferred / Nice\\-to\\-Have Skills** 



* Exposure to automation testing (Selenium/WebDriver, TestNG, JUnit).
* Basic knowledge of SQL for database validation.
* Experience with performance testing tools (JMeter).
* Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and version control (Git).
* Knowledge of scripting (Python/Java) for test automation.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, IT, or related field.
* QA certifications (ISTQB) are an added advantage.

title: SDE 2 Python
description:
We are seeking talented, driven individuals with a passion for tackling complex challenges and a strong desire to learn. As part of our engineering team, you will play a key role in orchestrating, deploying, and maintaining scalable and efficient applications.
 



 To excel in this role, you'll need experience in developing server\\-side logic and working on back\\-end solutions.
 



 Join us and be part of a team that thrives on innovation and impact!
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



1. Write reusable, testable, and efficient code.
2. Design and implement low\\-latency, high\\-availability, and performant applications.
3. Design and create RESTful APIs for internal and partner consumption.
4. Implement security and data protection.
5. Debug code on the platform (written by self or others) to find the root cause of any ongoing issues and rectify them.
6. Database query optimization \\& design and implement scalable database schemas that represent and support business processes.
7. Implement web applications in Python, SQL, Javascript, HTML, and CSS.
8. Provide technical leadership to teammates through coaching and mentorship.
9. Delegate tasks and set deadlines.
10. Monitor team performance and report on performance.
11. Collaborate with other software developers, business analysts to plan, design and develop applications.
12. Maintain client relationships and ensure Company deliverables meet highest expectations of the client.



  





**Mandatory Skills** 



1. 3\\+ years of experience in Python web frameworks, with a minimum of 2 years in Django. Knowledge of Flask is a plus.
2. Solid database skills in relational databases.
3. Knowledge of how to build and use RESTful APIs.
4. Strong knowledge of version control.
5. Hands\\-on experience on working on Linux systems.
6. Familiarity with ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries. Experience with SQL Alchemy is a plus.
7. Knowledge of Redis.
8. Strong understanding of peer review best practices.
9. Hands\\-on experience in deployment processes.



  





**Good to have Skills** 



1. Proficiency in AWS, Azure, or GCP (any one).
2. Experience with Docker.

title: MLOps Engineer(Freelance | WFH)
description:
**About BeGig** 




 BeGig is the leading tech freelancing marketplace. We empower innovative, early\\-stage, non\\-tech founders to bring their visions to life by connecting them with top\\-tier freelance talent. By joining BeGig, you‚Äôre not just taking on one role‚Äîyou‚Äôre joining a platform that continuously matches you with high\\-impact opportunities tailored to your expertise.
 



  





**Your Opportunity** 




 Join BeGig as an MLOps Engineer and take ownership of model deployment, monitoring, and lifecycle automation. You‚Äôll build scalable and reliable infrastructure that allows teams to ship ML models faster‚Äîand keep them performing in production.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 As an MLOps Engineer, you will:
 


* Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines for model training, versioning, and deployment.
* Implement monitoring systems for drift, latency, and model performance.
* Automate model retraining, evaluation, and production rollout processes.
* Work closely with ML engineers, data scientists, and DevOps to align workflows.
* Optimize infrastructure for scalability, cost efficiency, and high availability.



  





**Technical Requirements \\& Skills** 



* Experience: 3\\+ years in MLOps, ML engineering, or DevOps.
* Tools: MLflow, DVC, Kubeflow, SageMaker, Vertex AI, or Azure ML.
* Infra: Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Airflow.
* Programming: Strong Python skills and experience with APIs.
* Monitoring: Familiarity with Prometheus, Grafana, or model monitoring platforms.



  





**What We‚Äôre Looking For** 



* Engineer with a strong understanding of the full ML lifecycle.
* Practical problem\\-solver who prioritizes reliability and automation.
* Comfortable owning production systems and CI/CD pipelines.



  





**Why Join Us?** 



* Impact: Build the backbone that keeps AI systems running at scale.
* Flexibility: Remote, project\\-based MLOps and deployment work.



  





 Growth: Work with top AI teams and production ML environments.

title: Lead Backend Developer
description:
**About Us** 





 We're building the next generation of smart calculators for modern retailers ‚Äî tools that go far beyond basic math. These devices integrate dynamic QR code generation, digital payments, inventory tracking, and more. Think of it as a POS terminal disguised as a calculator ‚Äî but way smarter.
 





 ¬†Our mission is simple yet ambitious: to replace over 30 million traditional calculators sitting on shop counters across the world. If you're passionate about creating intuitive, impactful hardware \\+ software systems that empower everyday users ‚Äî join us in redefining what a calculator can do.
 




  





**About the Job** 





 We are looking for a hands\\-on¬†
 
**Backend Lead Engineer** 

 ¬†to own, scale, and optimize the backend systems powering our next\\-generation smart calculator ecosystem. This role involves leading backend architecture, mentoring engineers, and building robust services that support payments, IoT device sync, inventory, and real\\-time retail workflows.
 





 The ideal candidate enjoys designing large\\-scale distributed systems, writing clean and reliable backend code, and working closely with cross\\-functional teams across firmware, app, and DevOps. This role is ideal for engineers who want deep ownership, architectural influence, and the opportunity to shape the technical foundation of a fast\\-growing product.
 




  





**Key Responsibilities** 




**Backend Architecture \\& Development** 



* Design and develop scalable backend services using Java/Kotlin and Spring Boot.
* Build and maintain APIs for payments, inventory, device sync, and retail workflows.
* Optimize system performance, database queries, and API latency for real\\-world usage.
* Lead architectural decisions in collaboration with the CTO and Engineering Manager.



  





**Technical Leadership \\& Mentorship** 



* Guide backend engineers on best practices, design patterns, and system design.
* Conduct code reviews, ensure code quality, and maintain engineering standards.
* Support team members in debugging complex backend issues and production incidents.



  





**Cross\\-Functional Collaboration**

title: Workato Integration Engineer
description:
***We are seeking an experienced Integration Engineer with strong hands\\-on experience using Workato to build, maintain, and optimize integrations across enterprise systems. The ideal candidate will have integration experience with applications i.e, NetSuite, Salesforce etc. along with deep understanding of APIs, automation workflows, and data transformation. You will play a key role in designing scalable integrations, troubleshooting complex workflows, and enabling seamless data exchange for business\\-critical processes.***




  





**Need Immediate joiners** 




  





**Key Responsibilities:**




**Requirement Gathering:** 
 Work with business stakeholders (analysts, developers, project managers) to understand integration needs and translate them into technical solutions.
 



**Development:** 
 Create, configure, and deploy Workato recipes, connectors, and custom logic for data movement and process automation (e.g., between Workato and NetSuite).
 



**API \\& Data Management:** 
 Develop API integrations, manage data transformations (ETL), ensure data security, and handle authentication (REST, SOAP, JSON).
 



**Monitoring \\& Maintenance:** 
 Proactively monitor existing integrations, troubleshoot issues, perform root cause analysis, and optimize performance.
 



**Collaboration:**

 Thanks \\& Regards,
 



 Chandrashekhar Rao
 



**chandrashekhar@rbmsoft.com**

description:
**Job Description**




  





 The primary responsibility of the Lead Senior Software Engineer ‚Äì Full Stack is developing and maintaining modular and reusable backend and front\\-end components using.NET Core and Angular along with guiding the software engineers technically.
 



 The Engineer is instrumental in profiling and improving backend application performance, and take end\\-to\\-end technical ownership of applications and must be able to stay on top of technology changes in the market and continuously look for opportunities to leverage new technology.

title: Solar PV Engineer
description:
**Company Description** 




 QQ Engineering \\& Consulting (QQEC) is an independent consulting company specializing in renewable energy, headquartered in Anand, Gujarat. The company provides a comprehensive range of Advisory and Engineering services in the renewable energy sector.
 



  





 QQEC has successfully executed engineering projects totaling approximately 16 GW across various renewable energy technologies, including solar, wind, battery energy storage systems (BESS) and hybrid plants. Company portfolio encompasses a wide array of projects such as solar photovoltaic (PV) plants, Wind farm, Substations and Power System Studies, demonstrating their expertise and commitment to advancing sustainable energy solutions.
 



  





 QQEC offers comprehensive suite of services, including:
 



 ¬∑ Technical Advisory Services.
 



 ¬∑ Lender‚Äôs Technical Engineering (including bid management).
 



 ¬∑ Owner‚Äôs Engineering.
 



 ¬∑ Detail Engineering.
 



 ¬∑ Power System Studies.
 



 ¬∑ Feasibility Studies.
 



 ¬∑ Pre\\-Bidding Engineering Support.
 



 ¬∑ Third\\-Party Inspections.
 



 ¬∑ Procurement Assistance.
 



 ¬∑ Technical Due Diligence.
 



 QQ Engineering \\& Consulting (QQEC) boasts an in\\-house team of renewable energy consultants with diverse expertise, equipped with all necessary tools and software to deliver comprehensive services.
 








**Job Description:** 




 We are seeking a skilled and detail\\-oriented Solar PV Engineer (Electrical) with 3 to 7 years of experience in the design and engineering of solar photovoltaic (PV) systems. The ideal candidate will be proficient in energy yield analysis, system design (DC and AC) and have hands\\-on experience with solar design tools such as PVSyst, Helioscope and other PV simulation and layout tools. Preference will be given to candidates with experience in ground\\-mounted or rooftop solar PV projects.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Perform Solar PV Energy Yield Analysis using software tools like PV Syst, Helioscope, etc.
* Prepare DC system single line diagrams (SLD) including string sizing, module configuration, and cable routing.
* Perform DC and AC cable sizing and layout design.
* Develop detailed AC SLDs and overall plant electrical layouts.
* Design PV plant layouts including String combiner box grouping, Earthing layout, Lightning protection layout.
* Conduct shadow analysis and optimize system layout accordingly.
* Evaluate technical offers and specifications for PV modules, inverters, string combiner boxes (SCBs), SCADA systems, etc.
* Perform vendor document reviews and ensure compliance with project requirements and standards.
* Coordinate with cross\\-functional teams for project design, execution, and quality assurance.
* Support the development of rated power, PV Case, PV farm, or similar software\\-based analysis (preferred)



  





**Competency:** 



* Proficiency in PVSyst, Helioscope, AutoCAD, MS Office and solar\\-specific design tools.
* Knowledge of PV Case, PV farm or rated power software is a plus.
* Familiarity with national and international standards for solar PV design and implementation.
* Experience in both ground\\-mounted and/or rooftop solar PV projects.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and documentation skills
